sentence.Network_en: All material objects around announced thier irresponsibility with terrible iteration.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有身外一切东西,全都令人可怕地反复申明,自脱干系.

sentence.Network_en: Dodge is also a delay in their own irresponsibility of others.
sentence.Network_cn: 拖延推讬是对自己也是对别人的不负责任.

sentence.Network_en: The dentist was barred from practicing because of his irresponsibility.
sentence.Network_cn: 由于不负责,这个牙医被禁止从业.

entry.tran: 不负责任的;无责任感的
entry.def: If you describe someone as irresponsible, you are criticizing them because they do things without properly considering their possible consequences.

example.ex: I felt that it was irresponsible to advocate the legalisation of drugs...
example.tran: 我认为鼓吹毒品合法化是不负责任的行为。

example.ex: It would be irresponsible of me not to advise my company to abandon this project...
example.tran: 若我不建议公司放弃这个项目，那我就是不负责任。

means.word_mean: 1. a form of untrustworthiness; the trait of lacking a sense of responsibility and not feeling accountable for your actions

Sentence.sentence: Further evidence of McLaughlin's irresponsibility occurred on May 6 when he was returning from his shift.
